data.message: Sweetners increase your appetite so it's better to have a glass of full fat coke then glug loads of zero stuff!

replies.message: That's fundamentally wrong. If you have a glass of full fat coke you've already consumed needless calories. If you have a glass of coke zero, even if it did increase your appetite (which it doesn't) you are the one who makes the decision whether or not to overeat. Zero Calorie soft drinks will always be a better alternative to full sugar soft drinks.
Mike Strawson best not to drink either!!

Stephen hungry for change was good but failed to cite any sources when saying sugar free drinks contribute to weight gain. Safest bet is to follow simple nutrition advice, stick to real foods and drink neither sugar free or sugary soft drinks.
